name: 'Blueprint example: valid storage'
storage:
  minsize: 550 GiB
  partitions:
  - fs_type: ext4
    label: boot
    minsize: 800 MiB
    mountpoint: /boot
    type: plain
  - fs_type: xfs
    label: root
    minsize: 40 GiB
    mountpoint: /
    type: plain
  - logical_volumes:
    - fs_type: ext4
      label: vg_data_var
      minsize: 50 GiB
      mountpoint: /var
      name: lv_name
    minsize: 90 GiB
    name: vg_data
    type: lvm
  - minsize: 50 GiB
    subvolumes:
    - mountpoint: /var/backups
      name: root
    type: btrfs
  - fs_type: ext4
    label: plain-bytes
    minsize: 1 GB
    type: plain
  - fs_type: ext4
    label: plain-mib
    minsize: 100 MiB
    type: plain
  type: gpt
